articles.author: Quratulain Rehbar
articles.title: ‘Hindutva pop’: The singers producing anti-Muslim music in India
articles.description: Behind rising Islamophobia in India lies a network of right-wing artists composing songs played during hate campaigns.
articles.content:
New Delhi, India Insaan nahi ho saalo, ho tum kasaayi; Bahut ho chuka Hindu-Muslim bhai bhai You are not human, you are butchers; its enough of Hindu-Muslim brotherhood.

articles.title: Jurors were barred from certain details in the Jacob Hoggard trial. Here is what they didn't hear | CBC News
articles.description: Jurors have begun their deliberations in the sexual assault trial of Canadian musician Jacob Hoggard, lead singer of the band Hedley. Here is some of the information they were barred from hearing during trial in order to protect their impartiality.

articles.title: How Mdou Moctar’s Music Went Viral Via Bluetooth
articles.description: The guitarist’s music spread in his native Niger thanks to fans sharing it phone to phone.
articles.content: Depending on where you are in the world, life after the death of physical music looks very different. In West Africa, the post-CD landscape was populated by market stalls selling SIM and micro-SD car… [+3314 chars]

articles.author: Nicole Carpenter
articles.title: Undertale’s Toby Fox has songs in Pokémon Scarlet and Violet
articles.description: Undertale creator and Homestuck composer Toby Fox has new music in Pokémon Scarlet and Violet, returning to the franchise once again after doing a track in Sword and Shied.
articles.content: Undertale creator and Homestuck composer Toby Fox is returning to the Pokémon franchise with new music in Pokémon Scarlet and Violet. A second trailer for the ninth-generation Pokémon game dropped on… [+1662 chars]
